extendedInfo.description: The Phone Tracker is a tool that allows you to track the location of another Android or iPhone user.  Now you can follow the movements of a friend, your spouse, your child, or a co-worker with you Android.ââââââââââââââââââTrack one other Android or iPhone for FREE!ââââââââââââââââââThe Phone Tracker combines the robust GPS functionality of the Android, internet mapping and the latest features of the Android platform. Features include:âº Locate another person and view his/her movements during the previous 4 hours.âº Permission based system allows/denies other users to follow you.âº GPS options to reduce battery usage.âº Simple registration process.âº Follow both iPhones and Android phones.Uses include:âº Follow your child's movements during the day.âº Know where a family member is at any time.âº Track an employee's travel route.âº Locate friends.âº Find lost or stolen phones.Other items:âº This version allows you to track 1 person and see his/her movements for 4 hours. âº Upgrade allows you to follow up to 10 people and see their movements for 48 hours.âº To follow another person, they must use the "Phone Tracker" to grant you permission.âº Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.âº IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, EMAIL US AT: HELP@PhoneTracker.us.com

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This app works perfectly! People that are complaining about it just do not know how to use it right the app has to be installed on both phones it has to be running. But if you want to install it on someone phone and have it running without them knowing you can still do that if you can manage to get their phone happy do everything it told you to do to be able to track someone and just leave the app in the background running it should never come up. Very accurate with location
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tashxoxo
reviews.comment: This was so bad as soon as i got on it i had to make an account dont spend time on this its not reel :-[:-( Its only like one star but i really shound not be lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung GS2
reviews.comment: Does not work for me. Codes keep coming up as invalid. My friend also gets invalid codes. Stick with Latitude.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok...but i want more
reviews.comment: This app is okay. But it doesn\'t automatically refresh. Meaning I have to update my location in order to be accurate.
reviews.author: latoya mcclure

reviews.title: This app works well!
reviews.comment: Please don\'t listen to people who give bad reviews about this app. The thing is one needs to be clever enough to use his/her phone in order to get the full functionality of this amazing app. This app is definitely one of the useful apps in the market today. Period!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Needs app installed on the phone you want to track, plus this phone needs gps enabled, has to share its gps locations with ALL apps and google... useless... tracking the last phone mast a phone registered itself at works way way better and doesn\'t require an app installed or gps enabled. This app is a joke
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I put activation code in and it won\'t load. . Do 1 dodgy app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: mr
reviews.comment: this doesn\'t work, go for the No. 1 - life 360 instead; but I appreciate the effort of the app developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash!
reviews.comment: Crashes constantly. Loses all info. Have to repeatedly resend invitations/codes. Locks up phone. Then suggests that I pay to upgrade. I think not. Don\'t bother with this junk.
reviews.author: George Lewis

reviews.title: Pos kept telling me where I was...I already know! What waste.
reviews.comment: Pos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great service!
reviews.comment: This is a great app and the folks who wrote it /maintain it are awesome! Had a brief problem registering (AOL fail) and they had me handled within an hour if the app is only half as good as the developers (and so far it\'s way good) I will be happy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PEOPLE DON\'T WASTE YOUR TIME. I SURE DID
reviews.comment: Me and my wife just tried it 2/05/13 01:00 and did not work. Tried everything.. this guy waisted more then 1,000,000 of peoples lives and got paid a lot for it.DON\'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!
reviews.author: Jessie Hebert

reviews.title: Such a gd idea
reviews.comment: Installed today on my android and my daughters iPhone4 took a bit of messing about to get set up. But wrks great I now know where she is when she\'s out life saver
reviews.author: john paul lamont

reviews.title: Code invalid, GPS data unavailable.
reviews.comment: Uninstalling this app. The GPS data is unable to update.  Doesn\'t seem to work well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How sad
reviews.comment: What a nice app. Works great on my Motorola, but on my wife\'s iPhone 4, it drains her battery within hours. As a result we cant use it to look out for each other, just not practical.
reviews.author: Charles Freeman

reviews.title: When it works, its great but....
reviews.comment: It crashes constantly, and unless the other person updates theirs every hour, you can\'t track them...frustrating. tried to learn how to deal with it but its pretty useless unless they keep their phone GPS updated! Deleting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: useless app
reviews.comment: this free version is useless - it justs tracks yourself.  uninstalling! i give this app a negative three stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS tracker
reviews.comment: Great for keeping eye on kids lol. Works excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad at all
reviews.comment: It worked. I have a Samsung galaxy 2. The app allowed me to follow an iPhone. Works as advertised. Droid can follow an iPhone? Hard to find apps that do that with GPS. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Sent my daughter on a bike ride so I could track her. Worked flawlessly. Will be getting the pro version
reviews.author: Ryan Prather
